snippet.title: Swift Grouped Messages: Easy Auto Sizing Cells (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
A very common task in iOS is to provide auto sizing cells for UITableView components. In today's lesson we look at how to implement a custom cell that provides auto sizing using anchor constraints.  This technique is very easy and requires very little customization. Enjoy.
